definition: tablet announcing the name of leading actor in a theatrical production/by extension, the lead role
suffix for nouns
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
mahjong tile/playing card/game pieces/signboard/plate/tablet/medal/CL:片[pian4],個|个[ge4],塊|块[kuai4]
The Tiger tablet, Yuan dynasty play by Li Zhifu 李直夫[Li3 Zhi2 fu1]

sentences.english: Ceng Nianan explanation, xiao LAN is the number one here in the future.
sentences.chinese: 曾念安解释，以后萧岚就是这里的头牌。

sentences.english: The letter at Counter 6will pay you against your number slip.
sentences.chinese: 六号栏柜的出纳员将根据你的号头牌给付你钱。

sentences.english: NO02, In most games, face cards have a value of ten.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数的游戏中，人头牌代表了十点。

sentences.english: I shared this dish with my lunch companions.
sentences.chinese: 我与我的午餐同伴一起分享了这个头牌。

sentences.english: A card is put between two picture cards.
sentences.chinese: 一张牌是插在两张人头牌中。

sentences.english: His recent accomplishments have established him as Mexico's premiere fighter.
sentences.chinese: 他最近的这些成就已经使他成为墨西哥的头牌拳手。

definition: currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
crispy fried chicken
pillar/mainstay/star performer
a favorite of sb in power/a celebrity/American Indian
first rate/top rank/number one
to manage the household/to be the one in charge of the family/to call the shots/to be in charge
frequent visitor/fig. sth that crops up frequently
to be unwilling to pass on one's responsibilities to others
young woman/maiden/girl/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
lit. burn your hand, feel the heat (idiom)/fig. arrogance of the powerful/a mighty figure no-one dares approach/hot (exciting or in favor)
person of outstanding talent
resounding/loud/well known/famous
top-notch/first-rate
nouveau riche/upstart/new appointee

to come first in triennial palace examinations (idiom, refers to the carved stone turtle head in front of the imperial palace, next to which the most successful candidate in the imperial examinations was entitled to stand)/to be the champion/to be the very best in any field
erhua variant of 名角[ming2 jue2]
